content: TITLE: Installing Nivo Core and Bar Packages DESCRIPTION: Command to install the required nivo packages using yarn. Installs both the core package and bar chart component. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` yarn add @nivo/core @nivo/bar ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending POST Request to Nivo API Chord Chart Endpoint DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to make a POST request to the nivo-api chord chart endpoint using curl. It includes the required headers and JSON payload for creating a chord chart. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/api/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` curl -X POST \ --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \ --header 'Accept: application/json' \ -d '{ "width": 500, "height": 500, "data": [[223, 299, 345, 184], [123, 248, 65, 123], [412, 76, 187, 312], [97, 37, 502, 176]]}' \ 'http://localhost:3030/charts/chord' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing Nivo Project Dependencies DESCRIPTION: This command initializes the Nivo project by installing all required dependencies and establishing links between various packages using workspaces. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make init ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Storybook Development Mode DESCRIPTION: This command starts the Storybook development mode for the Nivo project, allowing easy development and testing of components. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make storybook ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Unit Tests for All Packages DESCRIPTION: This command executes unit tests for all packages in the Nivo project using Jest and react-test-renderer. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make pkgs-test ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Package Development Mode DESCRIPTION: This command runs a specific package in development mode, using 'bar' as an example package name. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make pkg-dev-bar ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Unit Tests for Specific Package DESCRIPTION: This command runs unit tests for a specific package, using 'bar' as an example package name. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make pkg-test-bar ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Formatting Code with Prettier DESCRIPTION: This command runs Prettier to format the codebase and ensure consistent code style across the project. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make fmt ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running ESLint on All Packages DESCRIPTION: This command executes ESLint on all packages to enforce consistent code style and catch potential issues. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make pkgs-lint ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running ESLint on Specific Package DESCRIPTION: This command runs ESLint on a specific package, using 'bar' as an example package name. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make pkg-lint-bar ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deploying Website and Storybook DESCRIPTION: This command deploys both the website and Storybook to GitHub Pages, requiring access to the Nivo GitHub repository. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make deploy-all ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Package Screenshots DESCRIPTION: This command generates screenshots for all packages based on the configuration in conf/base.yaml. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make pkgs-screenshots ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Linking to NetworkCanvas Component Documentation with Image in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Provides a link to the NetworkCanvas component documentation and displays a preview image of the component from the project's GitHub repository. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/packages/network/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [documentation](http://nivo.rocks/network/canvas/) ![NetworkCanvas](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/plouc/nivo/master/website/src/assets/captures/network-canvas.png) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Linking to Network Component Documentation with Image in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Provides a link to the Network component documentation and displays a preview image of the component from the project's GitHub repository. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/packages/network/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [documentation](http://nivo.rocks/network/) ![Network](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/plouc/nivo/master/website/src/assets/captures/network.png) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Nivo Logo in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Renders the Nivo logo as a linked image in markdown format. The image is sourced from the project's GitHub repository and sized appropriately. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/packages/network/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Package Version and Download Badges in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Shows npm version and download count badges for the @nivo/network package using shields.io. The badges are styled with a 'for-the-badge' theme. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/packages/network/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [![version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@nivo/network?style=for-the-badge)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@nivo/network) [![downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/@nivo/network?style=for-the-badge)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@nivo/network) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying nivo Logo in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to embed the nivo logo image in a Markdown file, linking to the nivo website and specifying image dimensions. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/packages/boxplot/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Package Header DESCRIPTION: Package title and npm badges showing version and download statistics SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/packages/annotations/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # `@nivo/annotations` [![version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@nivo/annotations?style=for-the-badge)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@nivo/annotations) [![downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/@nivo/annotations?style=for-the-badge)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@nivo/annotations) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying npm Version Badge in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to include an npm version badge for the @nivo/boxplot package using shields.io in a Markdown file. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/packages/boxplot/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [![version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@nivo/boxplot?style=for-the-badge)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@nivo/boxplot) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying npm Downloads Badge in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to include an npm download count badge for the @nivo/boxplot package using shields.io in a Markdown file. SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/packages/boxplot/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [![downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/@nivo/boxplot?style=for-the-badge)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@nivo/boxplot) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Version Headers DESCRIPTION: HTML anchor tags and markdown headers denoting version releases of the Nivo library SOURCE: https://github.com/plouc/nivo/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## v0.81.0 (2023-04-26) ```
